column6: Brand new house with exquisite decoration. We have two indoor parking spaces and three exterior parking spaces in case you are traveling by car. The beds are orthopedic which provides a comfortable rest. For us cleaning is an essential point in the house, so feel totally safe. The house has been designed and decorated to satisfy the needs of families, business trips and relaxation time. \nWe hope to make your stay an unforgettable experience!
column9: BRAND NEW HOME, EXQUISITE DECORATION, LARGE GARDEN
